articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: WHO and scientists call for urgent action on dangerous mpox strain - NBC News
articles.description: The World Health Organization and other outside scientists said the spread of a dangerous, deadly strain of mpox in Africa needs to be addressed urgently.
articles.content: The spread of mpox in Africa needs to be addressed urgently, the World Health Organization said on Tuesday, as scientists warned separately of a dangerous strain in the Democratic Republic of Congo.… [+2293 chars]
